title: Draw Funds from a Line of Credit
description: A corporate client needs to draw $100,000 from their commercial line of credit to cover a temporary cash shortfall.

tasks.description: Verify the requestor is an authorized user on the account.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the user's identity and authority to draw funds.

tasks.description: Check the available balance on the line of credit.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms there is sufficient availability for the $100,000 draw.

tasks.description: Process the draw and transfer the funds to the company's operating account.
